price: Waɗanda suke yin ĩmãni game da gaibi, kuma suna tsayar da salla, kuma daga abin da Muka azurta su suna ciyarwa.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَيُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ يُنفِقُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yu'minūna bil-ghaybi wayuqīmūna al-ṣalata wamimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūna
